description:
Revision II
After a little over a year, I think I can fix this tab a lot so let's do it
-Fixed Choruses and Octaves
-Fixed Tied Notes
-Fixed Outro
-Fixed Cleans
-Fixed String parts not being accurate
-More accurate harmonies and leads
-Fixed post solo section
-Added Markers
Right now am not even finished, this is like 90% of what I wanted to do, next, is that fixed bass I said I was gonna fix but I never bothered to, let's see if I am able to pull out a yes on this one
title: The Unforgiven II

description: Fixed Kirk's slides, added a new part for Kirk. Added Wide Vibrato on Clean guitar in verse 2 to simulate the Wah effect. Fixed some time signature issues.
title: The Unforgiven II

description: Reworked about 50% of James and Kirk's guitars, and added a second Clean guitar for the second Verse, and also for the first Verse. Also added slides to Kirk's octave riff. Additionally, I modified some Chorus and Volume values for some guitars (Clean II and Clean I). I will soon be reworking the bass most likely, since it is played in E string mostly. Hope you enjoy.
title: The Unforgiven II
